articles.author: Bryan Mena
articles.title: US consumers are feeling less optimistic about the economy for the first time this summer - CNN
articles.description: Americans became slightly less optimistic about the economy this month, following two straight months of growing confidence.
articles.content:
Americans became slightly less optimistic about the economy this month, following two straight months of growing confidence.
